'''Fox's Mooncall''' is [[Yae Miko]]'s Level 2 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
{{See also|Meditations of a Yako#Trivia}}
* The kanji of a part of the Japanese word {{ja|吼噦|rm=konkai|tl=to roar and hiccup,}} but it is used here as a kanji transcription of {{ja|こんこん|rm=konkon}}, the sound of the cry of a fox (similar to "meow" for cats in English). It may be also a reference to the ''{{w|Kyōgen|kyougen}}'' play ''Konkai'', which features the legendary kitsune {{w|Hakuzōsu|Hakuzousu}}.
